type_id.label: type_id
type_id.notProvided: The type_id field is required but was not provided.
type_id.invalidType: The type_id field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

type_name.label: type_name
type_name.notProvided: The type_name field is required but was not provided.
type_name.invalidType: The type_name field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
type_name.invalidLength: The type_name field is too long. This field must be no more than 85 bytes long.
